name: Premier Air
about: Premier Air is a dedicated flight school located in Iron Station, North Carolina, committed to providing exceptional flight training experiences. Our mission is to deliver top-notch instruction with a focus on customer service, making the process of learning to fly both pleasurable and affordable. Our certified flight instructors (CFIs) are experienced and passionate about aviation, ensuring students receive comprehensive and personalized training. Premier Air offers a full range of flight training programs, from private pilot licenses to advanced certifications, using state-of-the-art facilities and equipment. We strive to create a supportive and engaging learning environment, helping aspiring pilots achieve their aviation goals with confidence and skill. At Premier Air, we are dedicated to helping you take to the skies with excellence.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Flight Instructor - Instrument (CFII / IRI)
Instrument Rating (IR)"]
